description: This course is designed to assist students in developing their own teacher style as they prepare to become full-time teachers. Topics include the roles and responsibilities of teachers, methods of instruction, planning, classroom management, assessment and reporting and other current educational issues. Through micro-teaching and school-based field experiences, they also practice instructional skills and techniques. Required 20-hour field experience. Prerequisite: Education 290 and approval of teacher education application. Offered each semester.
name: Principles of Educ
notes: Open to Juniors and Seniors only.
prerequisites: Prerequisite: Education 290 and approval of teacher education application. Offered each semester.
title: Principles of Education, K-12
